body_html: Easiest thing to do is to tf.split() your tensor into batches of 10, call tf.reduce_max() across each of those tensors along the batch dimension, and then concat them back together. It sounds like you're not really looking to slide a window over the batch dimension since your kernel size is equal to your stride.

body: Easiest thing to do is to tf.split() your tensor into batches of 10, call tf.reduce_max() across each of those tensors along the batch dimension, and then concat them back together.  It sounds like you're not really looking to slide a window over the batch dimension since your kernel size is equal to your stride.
